snippet: India’s recent emotional loss against Pakistan comes on the heels of series defeats against South Africa and New Zealand, but cricket analysts say it’s too early to write the team off.
abstract: India’s recent emotional loss against Pakistan comes on the heels of series defeats against South Africa and New Zealand, but cricket analysts say it’s too early to write the team off.

headline.main: Indian Cricket Team's Problems Boil Down to Bowling, Experts Say
